title: 90/380/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 July 1990 concerning the updating of Annex I to Council Directive 89/440/EEC
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 July 1990
concerning the updating of Annex I to Council Directive 89/440/EEC
(90/380/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Directive 89/440/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision shall apply from 19 July 1990.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 July 1990.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 185, 16. 8. 1971, p. 5.
(2) OJ No L 210, 21. 7. 1989, p. 1.
